title: Inception
description: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets must plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to plunge Gotham into chaos.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker sentenced to life in prison forms an unlikely friendship and seeks redemption.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac and a soap salesman create an underground fight club that spirals out of control.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life story of a kind-hearted man who unwittingly influences historical events.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the truth about reality and joins a rebellion against its controllers.
